content.rendered:
Directed by Ram Ramesh Sharma

Written by Subhash Ghai. Sharad Tripathi

Star Vijay Raaz (Raunak Raj Singh). Amol Parashar (Harry (Jaiprakash’s Son)). Sanjay Mishra (Jaiprakash (Cook)). Ashwini Kalsekar (Benny (Housekeeper)). Barkha Singh (Antara Raj Singh). Madhuri Bhatia (Padmini Raj Singh). Pradeep Bajpai (Aditya Mane (Police Inspector)). Flora Saini (Mithika Singh). Rahul Singh (Gajendra Raj Singh). Liza Singh (Juhi). K.K. Gautam (Dev Paul (Security Man)). Pritam Kagne (Nancy). Nivedita Bhargava (Shantishree (Jaiprakash’s Wife)). Ishita Deshmukh (Laali ((Jaiprakash’s Daughter)). Gaurav Ghatnekar (Prateek Kakkar (Counsel)). Hetal Puniwala (Birendra Raj Singh). Anjum Rajabali (Dr. Punawala). Bharat Chandvani (Inspector Sadanand). Rishikesh Avhad (Inspector Amit). Devshree Sharma (Malini). Kailash H. Gehlot (Somnath). Neeraj Kumar (Karmi). Manjit Khan (Lali’s Grandfather). Arjun Giri (Shantishree’s Uncle). Iqbal Tauqeer (Forensic Officer). Purnima Singh (News Reporter)

Language Hindi

Producers Subhash Ghai. Rahul Puri

Production Mukta Arts. Zee Studios
